item.title: C# Properties and their different Uses
item.description: I learnt C# in parts from various resources, mostly because each one had their different starting points. One book heavily relied on using Visual Studio which definitely makes life easy, but makes you ignore the nitties-gritties of setting up .NET projects, while one did everything from scratch, which did scratch my itch (Get it? ðŸ˜œ) but had a really really slow pace. One constructs that I learnt about while seeing how to create classes was C# Properties.
